name: n8n-clone-backend
description: Backend API for n8n clone workflow automation platform

scripts.docker:db: docker run --name n8n-postgres -e POSTGRES_PASSWORD=postgres -e POSTGRES_DB=n8n_clone_dev -p 5432:5432 -d postgres:15
scripts.docker:db:stop: docker stop n8n-postgres && docker rm n8n-postgres
scripts.docker:redis:stop: docker stop n8n-redis && docker rm n8n-redis
scripts.docker:services: npm run docker:db && npm run docker:redis
scripts.docker:services:stop: npm run docker:db:stop && npm run docker:redis:stop
scripts.docker:setup: npm run docker:services && sleep 5 && npm run db:migrate && npm run db:seed
scripts.docker:dev: npm run docker:setup && npm run dev
scripts.compose:setup: docker-compose up -d && npm run compose:wait && npm run db:migrate && npm run db:seed
scripts.compose:wait: npm run compose:wait:postgres && npm run compose:wait:redis
scripts.compose:wait:postgres: docker-compose exec postgres sh -c 'until pg_isready -U postgres; do sleep 1; done'
scripts.compose:wait:redis: docker-compose exec redis sh -c 'until redis-cli ping; do sleep 1; done'
scripts.compose:dev: npm run compose:setup && npm run dev
